thread.title: Loews Corporation Announces Quarterly Dividend On Common Stock

author: cnbc.com
title: Loews Corporation Announces Quarterly Dividend On Common Stock

organizations.name: loews hotels holding corporation and consolidated container company llc

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Loews Corporation (NYSE: L) announced today the declaration of the Company's quarterly dividend of $0.0625 per share of Common Stock, payable March 13, 2018 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on February 28, 2018.
Loews Corporation is a diversified company with three publicly-traded subsidiaries: CNA Financial Corporation (NYSE: CNA), Diamond Offshore Drilling, Inc. (NYSE: DO) and Boardwalk Pipeline Partners, LP (NYSE: BWP); and two non-public operating subsidiaries: Loews Hotels Holding Corporation and Consolidated Container Company LLC. For more information please visit www.loews.com .
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/loews-corporation-announces-quarterly-dividend-on-common-stock-300597932.html
SOURCE Loews Corporation
